CustomField.description: Discretionary Discount entered by the user. In the UI, user can enter a currency amount or a percentage. If they enter a currency amount, the amount gets converted to a percentage before being stored.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Technically this is the "Annual Unit Discount", but a percentage is the same whether it is monthly, annual, or one-time (i.e. for perpetual products)
CustomField.label: Annual Unit Discount Percentage
